model.name: DB2_VBL
DB2
model.metadata:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ACT ( ACTNO short NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACTNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACTKWD string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACTKWD"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACTDESC string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACTDESC"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT PK_ACT PRIMARY KEY(ACTNO), CONSTRAINT RPAA FOREIGN KEY(ACTNO) REFERENCES ACT(ACTNO) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."ACT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CATALOG ( NAME string(128) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"NAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CATLOG object OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CATLOG"', NATIVE_TYPE 'XML', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_CATALOG PRIMARY KEY(NAME) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."CATALOG"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CL_SCHED ( CLASS_CODE string(7) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CLASS_CODE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "DAY" short OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DAY"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), STARTING time OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"STARTING"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIME', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ENDING time OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ENDING"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIME', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."CL_SCHED"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CUSTOMER ( CID long NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'BIGINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), INFO object OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"INFO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'XML', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), HISTORY object OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"HISTORY"', NATIVE_TYPE 'XML', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_CUSTOMER PRIMARY KEY(CID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."CUSTOMER"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE DEPARTMENT ( DEPTNO string(3) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPTNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DEPTNAME string(36) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPTNAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), MGRNO string(6) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MGRNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ADMRDEPT string(3) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ADMRDEPT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), LOCATION string(16) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"LOCATION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_DEPARTMENT PRIMARY KEY(DEPTNO), CONSTRAINT RDE FOREIGN KEY(MGRNO) REFERENCES EMPLOYEE(EMPNO) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."DEPARTMENT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE EMPLOYEE ( EMPNO string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMPNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), FIRSTNME string(12) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"FIRSTNME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), MIDINIT char(1) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MIDINIT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), LASTNAME string(15) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"LASTNAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), WORKDEPT string(3) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"WORKDEPT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PHONENO string(4) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PHONENO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), HIREDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"HIREDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), JOB string(8) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"JOB"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), EDLEVEL short NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EDLEVEL"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SEX char(1) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SEX"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), BIRTHDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"BIRTHDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SALARY bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SALARY"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), BONUS bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"BONUS"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), COMM bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"COMM"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_EMPLOYEE PRIMARY KEY(EMPNO) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."EMPLOYEE"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE EMPMDC ( EMPNO integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMPNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DEPT integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DIV integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DIV"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."EMPMDC"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE EMPPROJACT ( EMPNO string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMPNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PROJNO string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PROJNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACTNO short NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACTNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), EMPTIME bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMPTIME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), EMSTDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMSTDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), EMENDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMENDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') CONSTRAINT REPAPA FOREIGN KEY(PROJNO, ACTNO, EMSTDATE) REFERENCES PROJACT(PROJNO, ACTNO, ACSTDATE) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."EMPPROJACT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE EMP_PHOTO ( EMPNO string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMPNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PHOTO_FORMAT string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PHOTO_FORMAT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), PICTURE blob(102400) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PICTURE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'BLOB'), CONSTRAINT PK_EMP_PHOTO PRIMARY KEY(EMPNO, PHOTO_FORMAT), CONSTRAINT FK_EMP_PHOTO FOREIGN KEY(EMPNO) REFERENCES EMPLOYEE(EMPNO) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."EMP_PHOTO"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE EMP_RESUME ( EMPNO string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"EMPNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), RESUME_FORMAT string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"RESUME_FORMAT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), RESUME clob(5120) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"RESUME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CLOB'), CONSTRAINT PK_EMP_RESUME PRIMARY KEY(EMPNO, RESUME_FORMAT), CONSTRAINT FK_EMP_RESUME FOREIGN KEY(EMPNO) REFERENCES EMPLOYEE(EMPNO) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."EMP_RESUME"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE INVENTORY ( PID string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), QUANTITY integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"QUANTITY"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), LOCATION string(128) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"LOCATION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT PK_INVENTORY PRIMARY KEY(PID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."INVENTORY"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE IN_TRAY ( RECEIVED timestamp OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"RECEIVED"', NATIVE_TYPE 'TIMESTAMP', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SOURCE string(8) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SOURCE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SUBJECT string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SUBJECT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), NOTE_TEXT string(3000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"NOTE_TEXT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."IN_TRAY"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ORG ( DEPTNUMB short NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPTNUMB"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DEPTNAME string(14) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPTNAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), MANAGER short OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MANAGER"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DIVISION string(10) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DIVISION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), LOCATION string(13) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"LOCATION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."ORG"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE PRODUCT ( PID string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), NAME string(128) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"NAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), PRICE bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PRICE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PROMOPRICE bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PROMOPRICE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PROMOSTART date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PROMOSTART"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PROMOEND date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PROMOEND"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DESCRIPTION object OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DESCRIPTION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'XML', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_PRODUCT PRIMARY KEY(PID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."PRODUCT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE PRODUCTSUPPLIER ( PID string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), SID string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT PK_PRODUCTSUPPLIER PRIMARY KEY(PID, SID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."PRODUCTSUPPLIER"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE PROJACT ( PROJNO string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PROJNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACTNO short NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACTNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACSTAFF bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACSTAFF"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACSTDATE date NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACSTDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ACENDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ACENDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_PROJACT PRIMARY KEY(PROJNO, ACTNO, ACSTDATE), CONSTRAINT RPAP FOREIGN KEY(PROJNO) REFERENCES PROJECT(PROJNO) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."PROJACT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE PROJECT ( PROJNO string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PROJNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PROJNAME string(24) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PROJNAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), DEPTNO string(3) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPTNO"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), RESPEMP string(6) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"RESPEMP"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRSTAFF bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PRSTAFF"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRSTDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PRSTDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRENDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PRENDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), MAJPROJ string(6) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MAJPROJ"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_PROJECT PRIMARY KEY(PROJNO), CONSTRAINT RPP FOREIGN KEY(MAJPROJ) REFERENCES PROJECT(PROJNO), CONSTRAINT FK_PROJECT_2 FOREIGN KEY(RESPEMP) REFERENCES EMPLOYEE(EMPNO) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."PROJECT"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE PURCHASEORDER ( POID long NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"POID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'BIGINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), STATUS string(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Unshipped' OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"STATUS"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CUSTID long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"CUSTID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'BIGINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ORDERDATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ORDERDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PORDER object OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PORDER"', NATIVE_TYPE 'XML', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), COMMENTS string(1000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"COMMENTS"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT PK_PURCHASEORDER PRIMARY KEY(POID), CONSTRAINT FK_PO_CUST FOREIGN KEY(CUSTID) REFERENCES CUSTOMER(CID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."PURCHASEORDER"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE SALES ( SALES_DATE date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SALES_DATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SALES_PERSON string(15) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SALES_PERSON"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), REGION string(15) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"REGION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), SALES integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SALES"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."SALES"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE STAFF ( ID short NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), NAME string(9) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"NAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), DEPT short OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), JOB string(5) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"JOB"', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), YEARS short OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"YEARS"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SALARY bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SALARY"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), COMM bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"COMM"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."STAFF"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE STAFFG ( ID short NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), NAME string(18) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"NAME"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARGRAPHIC'), DEPT short OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DEPT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), JOB string(10) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"JOB"', NATIVE_TYPE 'GRAPHIC', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), YEARS short OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"YEARS"', NATIVE_TYPE 'SMALLINT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SALARY bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SALARY"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), COMM bigdecimal OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"COMM"', NATIVE_TYPE 'DECIMAL', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."STAFFG"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE SUPPLIERS ( SID string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"SID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ADDR object OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ADDR"', NATIVE_TYPE 'XML', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_PRODUCTSUPPLIER PRIMARY KEY(SID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DB2INST1"."SUPPLIERS"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
